description: Details of front zinc canopy at basement level, and full details of hard and soft landscaping and means of enclosure of all un-built, open areas as required by conditions 4 and 5 of planning permission 2021/3123/P dated 23/05/2022 for To front, new brick pier and timber gates, enlarged bin and cycle store, new canopy to basement flat entrance; to rear, erection of single storey rear extension at basement level within rear ligthwell, replacement of window with door at lower ground level, new Juliet balcony at ground level, rear boundary wall raised; new window to side elevation at first floor level, all to existing two flats.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
